Switch~ Ensemble Performance on MATA Interval Series

May 15, 2015 || Chris

The Switch~ Ensemble performed a curated concert on MATA’s Interval Series. The concert took place in New York City on May 15th at the DiMenna Center. The program included:

Zach Sheets
Seer (2014)
for sensor-augmented bass clarinet & electronics
Stylianos Dimou
[Hiss] structure...from {with[in} - g] (2015)
for flute, cello, piano & electronics
Stefan Prins
Flesh+Prosthesis #1 (2013)
for tenor sax, e-guitar, piano, percussion & electronics
Wojtek Blecharz
Transcryptum: K'an (2012)
for steel drum and ca. 130 sticks
Wojtek Blecharz
Transcryptum: The map of tenderness (2013)
for cello solo
Jason Thorpe Buchanan
Hunger: A Multimedia Opera in Four Parts (Part III, 2015)
for three singers, octet, electronics & video projection
Contact
Union College
Taylor Music Center
807 Union St.
Schenectady, NY 12308
